mapper.select: SELECT MIN(YEAR(registered_date)) as year FROM company WHERE registered_capital = 13 AND registered_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT MAX(YEAR(registered_date)) as year FROM company WHERE registered_capital = 13 AND registered_date IS NOT NULL

select m.year,count(0) companyNumber , SUM(IF(m.type=1,capital,0) ) rmb , SUM(IF(m.type=2,capital,0) ) us
from( select year(c.registered_date) year, IFNULL(c.registered_capital , 0 ) capital , IFNULL(c.registered_capital_type,1 ) type from company c WHERE company_type = 13 AND registered_date IS NOT NULL ) m
GROUP BY m.`year`
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(registered_date) AS year FROM company WHERE company_type = 13 and registered_date is not null ORDER BY YEAR DESC

SELECT c.`name` as companyName, c.address as address, f.risk_type as riskType, f.risk_status as riskStatus FROM company c LEFT JOIN finance_lease_risk f ON f.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN area a ON a.area_id = c.area_id
AND c.company_type = 13
AND a.name = #{areaName}
AND a.name = '黄浦区'

SELECT f.risk_type as riskType, f.risk_status as currentLevel c.`name` AS `name`, c.legal_person AS legalPerson, c.registered_capital AS registeredCapital, c.registered_capital_type AS registeredCapitalType, company.risk_level AS currentLevel FROM company c LEFT JOIN finance_lease_risk f ON f.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN area a ON a.area_id = c.area_id WHERE c.company_type = 13 AND c.`name` = #{name}
